definitions.title: adj. gent. pl.
definitions.body: = subst.; ´[[אֶרֶץ ס]] Is 49:12, identif. with Chinese by Thes:948–950 De Che:Comm. al.; but see v. Richthofen:China i. 436 f., 504, rev. by Yule:Acad. xiii. 339; Di Du; T. de Lacouperie:BOR i. 45 ff., 183 ff., who thinks of Šina, at foot of Hindu Kush, but unlikely; rd. prob. [[סְוֵנִים]] (or [[סְוׇנִים]]), so Che:Intr. Is 275, and Hpt., cf. already JDMich.
